Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game

Class StartScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game.StartScreenController
public class StartScreenController extends Object
Controller class for the StartScreenView.fxml. It sets up the connection and binds GameModel attributes to the View. It is also responsible for handling the user inputs and setting the games color theme.
Author:
Praket Chavan

      Label object

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      This method is called automatically when the StartScreenView is created. It initialises the MediaPlayer with the sound resource and loads in the properties file.
      Creates and starts the screen translate and fade animation for the into screen
      See Also:
      FadeTransition, TranslateTransition

    • onHighScoreClick

      private void onHighScoreClick()
      Method is called when the High score Button is pressed. Create the HighScoreView view as a popup which displays the highscore.

    • onStartClick

      private void onStartClick()
      Method is called when the start button is pressed on StartScreenView Reads the theme from the theme selection and saves it in the properties file.
      Creates the GameView view and replaces the StartScreenView with. Also sets the background color of the GameView to the color that the user selects

    • onThemeSelected

      private void onThemeSelected()
      This method is called when the user updated their theme choice It reads the new value from the ChoiceBox object and the writes to the theme.properties file.
      It also set the background color of the screen to the color that the user selects. The colors are defined in the theme.css file in the resource folder
